data.message: Design Skill Schema v1.1 for Cartridge Memory System: Created production-ready skill schema with: identity/classification/triggers/constraints/content/rendering/composition/lifecycle. Key innovations: precompiled minimal/compact/full renderings (eliminates summarization drift), separate skill_stats.json (avoids write amplification), 3-layer trigger system (hard → soft → budget), constraints field for hard rules. Stored decision and learnings to Duro.
data.task: Design Skill Schema v1.1 for Cartridge Memory System
